name: one night at derp tree
description:
Instructions

m to mute phone call space to put up your computer click on light to use it click on door to open and close it hold down r to reset your progress

Notes and Credits

this took me ages enjoy if any glitches tell me i have undated it there is now custom night if you complete the night 20 20 20 20 mode is imposable peaceteam channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCt-BlqLEaOGDJOBRrQqg3uw
